transcript.title: Visit by the Crown Prince of Thailand
transcript.content:
Â 22 SeptemberÂ 1988

The Crown Prince of Thailand, His. Royal Highness MahaÂ Vajiralongkorn, will visit Australia as a guest of theÂ Australian Government from 25-28 September. His RoyalÂ Highness will be Thailand's official representative at theÂ Thai National Day at EXPO on 26 September. He will alsoÂ make a private visit to Hobart and Canberra from 28Â September to 4 October where he will be the guest of theÂ Governor of Tasmania and the Governor-General respectively.
